DOC.brief_summary: This study collect clinical data ( safety reactogenicity ) GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals ' human papillomavirus ( HPV ) vaccine local target population per Bureau Food Drugs Directive Philippines .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Safety Vaccine Against Cervical Cancer ( HPV-16/18 L1/AS04 ) Healthy Filipino Females Aged 10 Yrs & Above
